issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body: FF Focus/Klar doesn't respect user certificates, unlike other browsers, so it can't be filtered over HTTPS, in normal FF filtering works, you just need to set permission to use user certificates https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-android/solving-problems/firefox-certificates/

pull_request.title: Bump husky from 9.0.7 to 9.0.10
pull_request.body:
Bumps [husky](https://github.com/typicode/husky) from 9.0.7 to 9.0.10.
Release notes

Sourced from husky's releases.

v9.0.10

  • fix: rename index.d.ts to index.d.mts by @​mrkjdy in typicode/husky#1379

v9.0.9

  • refactor: rename files by @​typicode in typicode/husky#1378

v9.0.8

  • docs: update index.md by @​khaledYS in typicode/husky#1369
  • Fix tab detection on install command by @​glensc in typicode/husky#1376
  • refactor: reduce file size by @​typicode in typicode/husky#1377
Commits
  • c042d9b 9.0.10
  • e529368 fix: rename index.d.ts to index.d.mts (#1379)
  • 6219cac 9.0.9
  • d8377fe refactor: rename files (#1378)
  • 211b80a 9.0.8
  • a5a45fc refactor: reduce file size (#1377)
  • d091328 fix: tab detection on install command (#1376)
  • 798f1ad docs: update list
  • b98985d test: expect init to exit with 0
  • 3e13656 docs: fix links
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=husky&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=9.0.7&new-version=9.0.10)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

> @troyn19 iOS - худшая из систем в плане блокировки рекламы. Полноценную программу запрещают использовать "для безопасности пользователей". Расширенная защита лишь частично решает проблемы, т.к. применяется с задержкой, и помогает не всегда.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.proffsmagasinet.se/
https://www.staypro.dk/
https://www.staypro.fi/
https://www.staypro.no/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://www.proffsmagasinet.se/
https://www.staypro.dk/
https://www.staypro.fi/
https://www.staypro.no/
```

### Issue:
When logged in, and managing your account, the various subscription options are blocked (some of which are enabled by default).

### Screenshots:
**Subscription options blocked:**

![filterissue-staypro-1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9382674/512db351-77eb-442f-ab25-d235d35806d6)

**Subscription options allowed:**

![filterissue-staypro-2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9382674/3046a6d8-b661-4a6f-983d-a6b8499f22e8)

**uBO's logger:**

![filterissue-staypro-3](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9382674/ca441e33-c74e-4a55-b2ff-f1bdf3806c95)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Tracking Protection filter**

### Problem rule:
`||exponea.com^$third-party`

### Possible fix:
`@@||cdn.*.exponea.com/production*/consent?$frame,domain=proffsmagasinet.se|staypro.dk|staypro.fi|staypro.no`

### Other problem filters:
* **EasyList - Cookie Notices** / **EasyPrivacy** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18433/
`##.consent-content`
`||exponea.com^$third-party`

* ~~**uBlock filters - Unbreak** https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/22298/~~ **_(FIXED)_**
~~`||exponea.com^$3p`~~

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v122.0-2 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
